Question: This person's second and last spaceflight was as mission commander of the Apollo 11 moon landing, in July 1969.
Hints: Flags were flown at half-staff on the day of this person's funeral.
This person's stint at Cleveland lasted a couple of months, and by July 1955, he returned to Edwards AFB for his new job.
This person is generally referred to as a "reluctant" American Hero.
